question: Who has clinched the 2017 Men's singles US Open Grand Prix Gold badminton tournament?
explanation: Indian Shuttler H S Prannoy has won the 2017 US Open Grand Prix Gold badminton tournament title by defeating his compatriot Parupalli Kashyap at Anaheim, California. He beat Kashyap in the final by 21-15, 20-22, 21-12. Prannoy had found place in the final defeating Vietnam\'s Tien Minh Nguyen while Kashyap overcame Korean Kwang Hee Heo in the semi-finals. In the women\'s singles of the tournament, Japanese Aya Ohori won the final beating Michelle Li of Canada.
